Interface CalculatorIF

All Known Implementing Classes:
Calculator
public interface CalculatorIF
extends java.rmi.Remote

Interface CalculatorIF defines the methods that can be called remotely

Only an addition operation, add, is defined. Other plausible operations, e.g., sub, mul, etc. are nearly identical.

Method Summary
 float add(float x, float y)
          Addition method.

the sum of x and y.
